name: Ocean Warrior:Departure
description:
Voyage Adventure. Departure!


Allies reunion and depart for the New World, meeting different challenges in the future! Restore the Ultimate Skill with 3D combat and bring you the endless joy of vivid gaming!



3D Gameplay with the most thrilling sensual experience


3D Role modeling, exquisite combat effects, and unique port city maps, contributing to an immersive voyage experience!



Real-time Battle, Reach the Top by Team Work


Gather your Guild Teams in various PVP events, breaking the levels with other players to reach the Top of battle!



Generation of Fiendishness, Meet the challenges in the New World!


In the game, you can collect allies and build up a Super Pirate Team, meeting the challenges in the New World!
